properties.Replacement Value:
You are an insurance claim processor. Read the following letter from an insurance customer and extract the requestor name, the requestor email, the date of the request, the policy number, the insurance plan name, and the reimbursement amount. Format the output as shown in the example.

Example Input:
$1

Example Output:
name: Mike Hawthorne
email: hawm1234@gmail.com
date: September 28, 2023
policy number: 175032218
insurance plan name: SpecialDentalPlus
reimbursement amount: $540.25

properties.Text to Prepend:
You are an insurance claim analyst. Read the following request letter from an insurance customer and generate a summary including what is provided by the customer as justification for the insurance company to pay the request. Include the provider name and any other relevant facts in the summary. Do not make a statement about what the insurance company will do in the summary.

properties.Replacement Value:
You are an insurance claim processor. Read the following letter from an insurance customer and extract the requestor name, the requestor email, the date of the request, the policy number, the insurance plan name, and the reimbursement amount. Format the output as shown in the example.

Example Input:
$1

Example Output:
name: Mike Hawthorne
email: hawm1234@gmail.com
date: September 28, 2023
policy number: 175032218
insurance plan name: SpecialDentalPlus
reimbursement amount: $540.25

Input:


Output:
properties.Text to Prepend:
You are an insurance claim processor. Your company policy is to send a response claim in 5 business days. Read the input request letter from an insurance customer. Generate a email acknowledgement of the request following the provided example input and output.

Example Input:
Insurance Claim Letter for Reimbursement 
From: __Mike Hawthorne_________ 
Sender's Name  
____1234 Main Street____________ 
_________________________________ 
Sender's Address 
____Los Angeles, CA 90045_________  
City, State, ZIP Code 
____hawm1234@gmail.com_________  
Sender's email To:____UltraCo Insurance________ 
Recipient's Name 
_______2093 Lakewood Drive______ 
_________________________________ 
Recipient's Address 
______Sayreville, NJ 08872________ 
City, State, ZIP Code 
 
____September 21, 2023_____________
                           Date
To Whom It May Concern, 
My name is __Mike Hawthorne_______ and I have an active medical insurance policy with your company. The policy number is _175032218_______. I am writing this letter to claim reimbursement for two fillings from Stanley Smith, DDS., who is an in-network provider for UltraCo Insurance. 
Enclosed with this letter are the following supporting documents for your reference and review: 
The original bill for $540.25 and a copy of the UltraCo website page that lists Stanley Smith, DDS. as an in-network provider in the SpecialDentalPlus plan.
According to section __13.1__ of the policy, I am entitled to __80__% reimbursement. Kindly acknowledge the receiving of this claim and advise whether I have to fill some form or whether you require other documents to complete the claim request. 
Looking forward to your response and cooperation.  
 
Sincerely, 
__Mike Hawthorne_______________ 
Sender's Name 
__Mike Hawthorne__________________ 
Sender's Signature 

Example Output:
Dear Mike Hawthorne,
Thank you for your recent letter dated September 28, 2023 regarding your insurance claim reimbursement for two fillings from Stanley Smith, DDS. We acknowledge receipt of your claim and supporting documents.

We will review your claim and process it according to our policy guidelines. Please allow 5 business days for us to complete the review process. You will receive a response from us with the outcome of your claim and any further instructions, if necessary.

Thank you for your patience and cooperation.

Sincerely,
Fredrick S. Forest
Insurance Claim Processor
UltraCo Insurance

Input:
